Author: The CombatReborn Team
Name: Rotation Solver Reborn
Description:
Analyses combat information every frame and finds the best action.

This means almost all the information available in one frame in combat, including the status of all players in the party, the status of any hostile targets, skill cooldowns, the MP and HP of characters, the location of characters, casting status of the hostile target, combo, combat duration, player level, etc.
Then, it will highlight the best action on the hot bar, or help you to click on it.
It is designed for `general combat`, not for savage or ultimate. Use it carefully.
Punchline: Analyses combat information every frame and finds the best action.
Changelog:
## What's Changed
* Changed auto-targeting defaults to low hp and high hp by @NostraThomas99 in https://github.com/FFXIV-CombatReborn/RotationSolverReborn/pull/116
* AoEs that don't require a target now work in manual mode by @NostraThomas99 in https://github.com/FFXIV-CombatReborn/RotationSolverReborn/pull/117
* Disable migrations until a better solution can be found by @NostraThomas99 in https://github.com/FFXIV-CombatReborn/RotationSolverReborn/pull/118


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/FFXIV-CombatReborn/RotationSolverReborn/compare/4.1.0.0...4.1.0.1

Author: The CombatReborn Team
Name: BossMod Reborn
Description: A bunch of utilities to simplify boss mechanics
Punchline: Don't fail at raid mechanics anymore
Changelog:
## What's Changed
* Yorha dark apocalypse enumerated (not yet supported, this is groundwork) by @LTS-FFXIV
* Crystal tower enumerated (not yet supported, this is groundwork) by @LTS-FFXIV
* Shadow of mhach enumerated (not yet supported, this is groundwork) by @LTS-FFXIV
* basic Delubrum Reginae Normal support (missing a few mechanics) by @LTS-FFXIV


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/FFXIV-CombatReborn/BossmodReborn/compare/1.0.0.19...1.0.0.20

Author: The Combat Reborn Team
Name: ActionTimeline Reborn
Description: Configurable timeline display of all the actions you use.
